title: Vaccine Contamination
cleaned_text:
It is the vaccinated that present a clear danger of infecting the non-vaccinated, according to this highly eye-opening research...

In a remarkable new study with potentially immediate and earth-shattering effects on the vaccine industry and the regulatory agencies that oversee their safety, researchers have found extensive and inexplicable widespread contamination of vaccines with particles that, according to the authors of the study, clearly should not be present.

A highly controversial new study on heavy metal contaminated vaccines is under fire, but its detractors fail to understand that, in nano-toxicology, size matters much more than commonly believed. Indeed, sometimes the smaller the size, the greater the toxicity.

The alternative media is justifiably abuzz with a story about the CDC deleting a page on their website admitting that as many as 98 million Americans received polio vaccine contaminated with the cancer-linked monkey virus SV40.

7 Most Disgusting Ingredients Used To Make Vaccines Parents have the right to understand what is being put into their child’s body. The production of vaccines uses many disgusting ingredients. Learn more about common ingredients found in vaccines.
